settings.label: Zone Name Channel
settings.description: The zone name channel used to identify the zone for the widget

settings.label: Vertical Layout
settings.description: Layout in a vertical format (vs horizontal)

settings.label: Preset Labels
settings.description: Use Preset Numbers instead of Labels

settings.label: Panel ID
settings.description: (Advanced) The panel identifier if multiple panels on same desktop

name: Russound Settings
author: Tim Roberts
